summary: A widowed farmer takes an indentured servant as his new wife, but the arrival of his old friend threatens their burgeoning relationship.
cast: Loretta Young|William Holden|Robert Mitchum|Gary Gray|Tom Tully|Sara Haden|Frank Ferguson|Walter Baldwin|Regina Wallace|Frank Conlan
keywords: based on novel|four word title|singing|dog|black powder gun
title: Rachel y el forastero
